name: 葉奕良
objective: 講授各種電機機械的工作原理及特性，內容包含：變壓器、直流馬達、感應馬達、伺服及步進馬達、機電系統。
schedule:
Week 1: Preparation week
Week 2: Introduction
Week 3: Basic concept of model and system
Week 4: DC motor and Galvanometer
Week 5: Accelerometer
Week 6: Liquid level system
Week 7: Heat transfer system
Week 8: System state variable
Week 9: Midterm examination
Week 10: Lagrange dynamic I
Week 11: Lagrange dynamic II
Week 12: Lagrange dynamic III
Week 13: State-space model 
Week 14: Stability of equilibrium points
Week 15: Phase portrait
Week 16: Linearization of nonlinear system 
Week 17: State manifold
Week 18: Final examination
materials:
[1] D. Zorbas, "Electric Machines: Principles, Applications, and Control Schematics", 2nd Edition, CENGAGE learning, 2015
(中譯版：陳雙源   滄海圖書)

[2] C. M. Close, D. K. Frederick, and J. C. Newell, "Modeling and Analysis of Dynamic Systems", 3rd Edition, Wiley, 2001.

[3] J. H. Ginsberg, "Advanced Engineering Dynamics", 2nd Edition, Cambridge University Press, 1998.

[4] T.D. Burton, "Introduction to Dynamic Systems Analysis", McGraw-Hill, 1994
